title: Incentive theories of motivation explain the de...

content.prompt: Incentive theories of motivation explain the desire of people to achieve goals in terms of which of the following?

choices.label: internal states of tension that need to be resolved
external stimuli that have the capacity to affect behavior
tendencies that strike a balance between biological and social needs

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
